changes.short_description: Added deployer type to manage mods in modsettings.lsx for Baldur's Gate 3
OpenMW Plugin Deployer now additionally manages .omwscripts files
Removed LOOT support for OpenMW Plugin Deployer
changes.long_description: LOOT currently does not support .omwaddon and .omwplugin files. Without this, showing conflicts or sorting by them is not useful.

changes.short_description: OpenMW Plugin Deployer now supports adding a groundcover tag and adds tagged plugins as groundcover entries to openmw.cfg
OpenMW Plugin Deployer now handles files with the following extensions: .esm, .esp, .omwgame, .omwaddon, .omwscript
For Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas and Oblivion: Loot Deployer new only adds active plugins to plugins.txt and adapts plugin file timestamps according to the load order
App launch command now uses xdg-open to support both flatpak and system Steam
Fixed tags and deployer duplication when importing steam apps while reusing an existing staging directory
Added import config for: Stardew Valley
Added import config for: Fallout 3, Oblivion GOTY, Fallout 3 GOTY, Fallout: New Vegas, Fallout 4, Subnautica: Below Zero, Oblivion GOTY Deluxe
Fixed broken symlinks not being detected
Fixed paths for Steam app icons
